text:
GoDaddy is looking for a passionate full-stack software engineer who loves Ruby and Rails, Open Source and has a keen understanding of high performance architectures and technologies to join our Online Presence team. This team is building our e-commerce Online Store solution based on a popular Open Source project called Spree. You will be building products that will scale globally and help small business owners all around the world, as well as contributing code and our learnings (good and bad) back to the Open Source community.

See the full description: http://hire.jobvite.com/m?337D1hwA Check our GitHub page: http://github.com/godaddy.
